description: Mint, broccolini and broad beans are the stars of this super green pesto. Have it as a dip, smear it on sandwiches or even savoury breakfasts. Try it today.
keywords: Pesto,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Sesame free,Broccolini,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Bean & Broccolini Pesto Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup extra virgin olive oil, plus extra

recipeInstructions.text: Place beans and broccolini in a large heatproof bowl. Cover with boiling water and set aside for 2 minutes. Refresh in cold water and drain well.

Transfer to a food processor. Add mint, parmesan, walnuts, garlic, zest and lemon juice. Process to a rough paste. Add oil and process to combine. Season to taste. Transfer to a jar and cover in a thin layer of extra oil. Seal jar and refrigerate until ready to use.
